description: Details required by condition 14 (works on site) of Planning permission 19/01207/FUL (Alterations and extensions of existing student Seething Wells Campus to provide additional student accommodation and ancillary facilities. Rooftop extensions to existing buildings to provide 159 new student rooms, alterations to Listed Buildings to provide a caf√©, flexible meeting and recreation spaces and other ancillary facilities)
decision_conditions: The details submitted for Condition 14 (works on site) of planning permission 19/01207/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and this condition is hereby fully discharged.

The applicant is advised that should protected species be found as a result of future development he/she must fulfil his/her duties under the Wildlife and Countryside Act 1981 (as amended) and the Conservation of Habitats and Species Regulations 2017 (as amended).

Please provide a copy of block plan scaled 1:500 showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.
